subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|p}} – A vertical eye of a man looking downwards. As the individual character it is used as a metaphor meaning “to surrender”, while the meaning relating to eyes appears when used as a radical, such as in {{zh-l|*臨|to look down at}}. {{attention|zh|臨 claims to derive from 臥, not 臣}}
